body.p: I have received the letter asking me to write for the "Broadway". I do not write much, but your invitation is cordially appreciated, and may serve as the spur toward something. I can at present only briefly say that should I be able to prepare an article, or poem, appropriate for the purposes of the magazine, I will send it on—& that I shall surely try to do so.
My address is at the Attorney General's office here. (New York house, please forward this to Mr. Edmund Routledge, London.)
